document_data.name: Fellowship of the Dreaming Dragon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Fellowship of the Dreaming Dragon''' was an [[adventuring company]] of the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It consisted of [[Caledan Caldorien]], [[Kera]], the [[mage]] [[Morhion Gen'dahar]], [[Ferret Talondim]] the [[thief]], [[Tyveris]], and the [[halfling]] [[Estah]].<ref>
